com.fexco.util.manager

Class ConverterContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fexco.util.manager.ConverterContainer

  • public class ConverterContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for associating converters with supported locales. Using Locale because in some languages spelling may vary based on location (e.g. Spanish, partially English). Currently supporting only language comparison TODO Locale may be included in IWordifiedNumber interface
